shadow.name: AGITATION
shadow.description: The shadow frequency of The Arousing, expressing through agitation

gift.name: INITIATIVE
gift.description: The gift frequency of The Arousing, expressing through initiative

siddhi.name: AWAKENING
siddhi.description: The siddhi frequency of The Arousing, expressing through awakening

inversion_protocols.script: This is Gate 51 shadow frequency. The agitation you're experiencing is a distortion of your natural initiative. Through awareness and experimentation, you can shift from agitation to initiative.
inversion_protocols.somatic_anchor: Feel into your heart. Notice the sensation of agitation.

experiment.hypothesis: If I work with Gate 51 consciously for 7 days, the agitation pattern will shift toward initiative.
experiment.action: Daily practice working with Gate 51 energy.

success_criteria.target: Noticeable shift from agitation toward initiative
